name: Roll Monsters (Event Horizon School)
description:
Roll Monsters is an up to 4 Players local Multiplayer Game in which you have to be the last one to survive! Use dodges, rolls and special abilities in order to defeat your opponents and win.

Choose from 9 different characters and 2 special abilities!

Each character has different stats, try them all to find the one that suits your playstyle!

The Game supports XInput controllers and most standard controllers like the Dualshock 4.

Controls (for Xbox Controller):

Left Stick - Movement
LS + A/RT Direction Dash
LS + B/LT Directional Dodge
LS + Y/RB Special Ability
X/LB Taunt

Do you want to play the game Online? We suggest using Parsec, a free program to play local Multiplayer games Online!
